This document lists all known values of the raw, decompressed player character structure
Every value is in little endian unless mentioned otherwise.

68 02 01 00 00 00 1F 00 00 00 00 00 CA 48 49 71 02 00 00 00 73 09 84 12 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 1C 0E EB 52 01 00 00 00 00 00 5D A5 DE 39 80 0B 3A 67 00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 A5 3F C7 06 00 00 E7 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 80 3F 84 12 00 00 00 09 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 00 00 00 73 09 F2 84 16 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 A7 3F C7 06 00 00 E7 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 80 3F F2 84 16 00 00 09 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 B7 F3 63 6D A5 3F C7 06 00 00 E7 01 84 84 24 00 00 00 B7 F3 63 6D A7 3F C7 06 00 00 E7 01 69 F3 26 67 02 00 00 00 00 00 44 64 73 43 84 12 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 44 64 73 43 F2 84 16 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 9B 97 4C 00 00 00 00 50 00 00 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 CD 85 87 2C 00 00 49 3B 81 18 00 00 00 00 00 00 10 F7 D5 73 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 FA C2 8E 61 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 A1 6B F9 2D 84 0C 
[0x01A0-0x01A1] Makes a bunch of bubbles at the right pop up: AB 04 
[0x01A2-0x01A5] Current Experience: 2C 00 00 00 
[0x01A6-0x01A7?] Makes a special event bubble appear: 01 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 15 13 19 5E 00 00 AF 52 71 18 01 00 00 00 00 00 93 ED 0E 6F 80 0B 3A 67 07 00 00 00 00 00 A9 19 EB 6C 00 00 00 00 00 00 07 8D D0 72 
[0x01E0-0x01E3] Packed hair+hat+face data?: 24 00 C0 B8 
[0x01E4-0x01E4] Hat color: 94 
[0x01E5-0x01E5] Robe color: 52 
[0x01E6-0x01E6] Robe accent: 40 
[0x01E7-0x01E7] Boot accent: 29 
[0x01E8-0x01E8] Idle staff posture?: 01 
00 00 00 88 BE C1 
[0x01EF-0x01EF] Setting this to 0xFF makes the eyes glow: 04 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 78 9B 11 3D 00 00 16 08 01 00 01 01 00 00 00 88 BE C1 04 00 00 B3 7B 00 00 00 00 00 00 09 EA 48 5D 00 00 80 DB CD 69 96 00 00 00 64 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 D6 D3 69 1F 00 00 13 5A E5 70 00 00 EE 44 D4 5C 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
[0x0248-0x024B] Current Energy: 28 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 BE 5B B6 44 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 BC 98 41 3B 00 00 59 02 2E 79 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 68 8B E3 31 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 68 8B E3 31 00 00 00 00 E7 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 80 3F 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 D8 33 3D 76 02 00 00 00 E6 25 D6 2A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 5F 30 73 1D 00 00 68 8B E3 31 00 00 00 00 E7 03 00 00 00 00 60 51 70 38 00 00 35 0E 99 04 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 98 8D 90 75 00 00 84 88 B6 7D 00 00 07 8F B4 4B 00 00 CF A0 B6 70 00 00 1F F0 DE 23 00 00 56 19 07 0F 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 03 AF 52 01 00 00 AA 02 00 80 

{
	All of the following crashes probably have something to do with collision boxes and positions
	They probably are one or more remote function calls
}

[0x0340-0x0343] Crashes lots of stuff if set to only 0xFF (Very violent, "invalid arguments"):8D C4 00 00 
[0x0344-0x0347] Crashes the game runtime if set to only 0xFF: 00 00 00 00 
[0x0348-0x034B] Crashes the game runtime if set to only 0xFF: 00 00 00 00 
[0x034C-0x0351] Crashes lots of stuff if 0xFF: 00 00 00 00 00 00 
[0x0352-0x0355] Crashes lots of game parts if set to only 0xFF (Very violent, "invalid arguments"): 66 66 96 40 
[0x0356-0x0359] Crashes the game runtime if set to only 0xFF: 00 00 80 3F 
01 00 00 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 01 00 01 AF 52 01 00 00 AA 02 00 00 1C D7 51 47 
[0x037C-0x037F] Max Health: C2 01 00 00 
[0x0380-0x0383] Max Mana: 0F 00 00 00 
[0x0384-0x0387] Max Gold: E0 93 04 00 
88 13 00 00 64 00 00 00 
[0x0390-0x0393] Max Energy: 28 00 00 00
[0x0394-0x0397] Current Health: C2 01 00 00 
[0x0398-0x039B] Current Gold: 09 00 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
